oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Open archive for organic research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the fall of 2002, the Danish Research Centre for Organic Farming (DARCOF) established an electronic, open access archive called Organic Eprints. The archive receives papers, reports, theses, and other documents that are related to research in organic agriculture. This article is a short introduction to the background and purposes of the archive.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Alrøe, Hugo Fjelsted (2003) Open archive for organic research. DARCOFenews (1).
